citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The IACUC is not performing a review of the facility's program for humane care and use of animals every six months.
IACUC records reviewed during this inspection indicate that IACUC semi-annual reviews of the facility’s program for the
care and use of animals occurred on August 12, 2022, and then not again until June 1, 2023. Regular reviews are
necessary to ensure IACUC oversight of the program and to ensure the welfare of the animals being used in research by
the facility. With respect to activities involving animals, the IACUC, as an agent of the research facility, shall review at
least once every 6 months, the research facility’s program for humane care and use of animals. Correct by ensuring the
IACUC reviews the facility's program for humane care and use of animals at least once every six months. Correct by
December 20, 2023.

citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The IACUC is not performing a review of the animal facilities every six months. IACUC records reviewed during this
inspection indicate that IACUC semi-annual reviews of the animal facilities occurred on August 12, 2022, and then not
again until June 1, 2023. Regular reviews are necessary to ensure IACUC oversight of the facility and to ensure the
welfare of the animals being used in research by the facility. With respect to activities involving animals, the IACUC, as an
agent of the research facility, shall inspect at least once every six months, all the research facility’s animal facilities,
including animal study areas. Correct by ensuring the IACUC inspects the animal facilities at least once every six months.
Correct by December 20, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
